ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] ears, and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] experimentally [npc.verb(twitch)] [npc.her] new synthetic ears back and forth.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSynthetic(synthetic ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF synthetic ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
